definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: if you are a melancholic soul, it seems always cloudy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你心里阴云密布，天就总是灰的。

sentences.english: Suddenly the storm clouds thickened， winds came in gusts， and rain poured in torrents.
sentences.chinese: 忽然间阴云密布，狂风怒号，大雨倾注。

sentences.english: The clouds are gathering for a storm.
sentences.chinese: 阴云密布，看来快下暴雨了。

sentences.english: The clouds are really dark and it's getting quiet around the time,
sentences.chinese: 乌云密布，四周都是暴风雨前的宁静。

sentences.english: Makers of traditional software will find the going even tougher.
sentences.chinese: 传统软件制造商之路将更加荆棘密布。

sentences.english: The southern polder area of China has fertility soil, variegated rivers and plentiful natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 我国南方圩区土壤肥沃，水网密布，资源丰富。

sentences.english: It looked like clouds and a sense of humor didn't mix.
sentences.chinese: 这里看上去乌云密布，和幽默感格格不入。

sentences.english: Their hairless faces have protruding lower jaws filled with pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 他们脸上无毛，突出的下巴上利齿密布。

sentences.english: Other features visible in the image include a solid field of low cloud cover at the lower left corner of the image.
sentences.chinese: 图像中的其他可见特征包括密布于左下角的低云。

sentences.english: The sky was cloudy, but the wind wasn't too strong for the two-hour crossing.
sentences.chinese: 天空乌云密布，但风不强过两个路口向右转。
却从乌云密布的空中降落人间。

sentences.english: In the sun dappled shadows, her banded markings make her invisible.
sentences.chinese: 身上密布的条纹使她得以隐藏在阳光投射下的阴影中。

sentences.english: Dark clouds massed, and I expected rain.
sentences.chinese: 乌云密布，我预计要下雨。

sentences.english: How does a once-sunny landscape suddenly become darkened with heavy storm clouds?
sentences.chinese: 从前阳光灿烂的景色，怎么突然变得乌云密布？
镜子河畔，单车驶过，阴云密布。

sentences.english: The metropolitan area of Chicago nestles at the south end of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥城临湖而建，道路纵横，街区密布。

definition: to be covered with/to be filled with
to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
numerous and close together/densely packed/thickly dotted/thick/dense
scattered about like stars in the sky or chess pieces on a board (idiom); spread all over the place
see 密密麻麻|密密麻麻[mi4 mi5 ma2 ma2]
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
